医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现有氧糖酵解对哺乳动物眼睛发育至关重要根据发表在《自然通讯》上的西北医学新研究，有氧糖酵解是细胞将葡萄糖转化为乳酸的过程，是哺乳动物眼睛发育的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Aerobic-grinding-essential-for-eye-development-in-mammals-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Aerobic-grinding-essential-for-eye-development-in-mammals-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef395ef9-a58b-4b2a-8237-3cc06eb468c7 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 21:09:47 -0400 Aerobic glycolysis essential for eye development in mammals, study finds
性别、社会经济因素和种族/民族与艾滋病毒吸烟者合并症相关根据《护士协会杂志》7 月号的一项研究，艾滋病毒感染者的高吸烟率与高并发健康问题相关，而这些健康问题与性别、种族/民族和社会经济地位等特征有关。在艾滋病护理方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Gender-socioeconomic-factors-and-raceethnicity-linked-to-comorbidities-among-smokers-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Gender-socioeconomic-factors-and-raceethnicity-linked-to-comorbidities-among-smokers-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c9ef498-f72f-47dc-9f3a-3287d37de119 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 21:07:04 -0400 Gender, socioeconomic factors, and race/ethnicity linked to comorbidities among smokers with HIV
精准畜牧技术可早期诊断导致小牛死亡的牛呼吸道疾病一项新的研究表明，利用基于“物联网”或物联网的精密技术监测奶牛，可以更早地诊断出导致小牛死亡的牛呼吸道疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Precision-livestock-technologies-offer-earlier-diagnosis-of-calf-killing-bovine-respiratory-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Precision-livestock-technologies-offer-earlier-diagnosis-of-calf-killing-bovine-respiratory-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806cb867-4476-49ba-acf8-2e4e1169e50d Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:59:58 -0400 Precision livestock technologies offer earlier diagnosis of calf-killing bovine respiratory disease
波士顿大学教授获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助，研究 PFAS 毒物对血管系统的影响波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院医学教授 Noyan Gokce 博士因其研究“全氟/多氟烷基 (PFAS) 污染物对血管的影响”而获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) R-21 453,750 美元的资助疾病机制。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/BU-professor-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-impact-of-PFAS-毒物-on-the-angio-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/BU-professor-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-impact-of-PFAS-毒药-on-the-angio-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe0a3239-fc29-44df-a506-6dc9f53c2165 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:52:43 -0400 BU professor receives NIH grant to study impact of PFAS toxicants on the vascular system
复杂行为所需的基因起源于大约 6.5 亿年前由莱斯特大学研究人员领导的一组科学家发现，学习、记忆、攻击性和其他复杂行为所需的基因起源于大约 6.5 亿年前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Genes-required-for-complex-behaviors-originated-around-650-million-years-ago.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Genes-required-for-complex-behaviors-originated-around-650-million-years-ago.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c723a80b-9549-428f-9b7e-db718fd96a2c Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:48:11 -0400 Genes required for complex behaviors originated around 650 million years ago
NIH 用于阶段性临床试验的资金占总支出的<3.5%本特利大学科学与工业整合中心的一项新研究显示，美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 为 2010 年至 2019 年 FDA 批准的药物的分期临床试验提供了 81 亿美元的项目资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/NNIH-funding-for-phased-clinical-Trials-represents-3c3525-of-total-spending.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/NNIH-funding-for-phased-clinical-Trials-represents-3c3525-of-total-spending.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25aa2116-560f-4c49-8d63-99fc5b32030c Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:32:00 -0400
研究发现，高度隔离社区的黑人居民预期寿命较短西北医学的一项新研究报告称，生活在高度隔离社区的黑人居民的预期寿命显着缩短。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Black-residents-in-highly-segreated-neighborhoods-have-shorter-life-expectancies-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Black-residents-in-highly-segrelated-neighborhoods-have-shorter-life-expectancies-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=280c0430-329d-4c60-8ffc-ff8f896b1b8c Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:27:00 -0400 Black residents in highly segregated neighborhoods have shorter life expectancies, study finds
有条件现金转移计划与拉丁美洲儿童死亡率的降低有关巴塞罗那全球健康研究所领导的一项影响评估研究显示，过去二十年里，有条件现金转移计划已使巴西、墨西哥和厄瓜多尔的儿童死亡率降低了 24%，相当于避免了超过 70 万儿童死亡(ISGlobal)，一个由“la Caixa”基金会支持的机构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Conditional-cash-transfer-programs-linked-to-reduction-in-child-mortality-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/Conditional-cash-transfer-programs-linked-to-reduction-in-child-mortality-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67514040-1676-44ab-a36d-83a82e9d9824 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:22:34 -0400 Conditional cash transfer programs linked to reduction in child mortality in Latin America
m6A 修饰作为自身免疫性疾病的潜在治疗靶点N6-甲基腺苷 (m6A) 是跨物种研究最广泛的 RNA 修饰，m6A 修饰在免疫系统中的重要作用已在不同的背景下得到揭示，包括 mRNA 代谢、细胞分化、增殖和对刺激的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/m6A-modification-as-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/m6A-modification-as-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a750dc9f-1a74-4ece-bc2f-e7e1b04dabff Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:17:10 -0400 m6A modification as a potential therapeutic target for autoimmune diseases
DFG 资助新的临床研究单位研究自身免疫介导的神经系统疾病由抗体引起、触发或影响的神经系统疾病是如何出现的？还有什么更好的诊断方法，尤其是治疗方法？这些是由柏林夏里特医学大学领导的新临床研究单位“BecauseY”解决的问题。创新的治疗方案将特别有利于那些乍一看并未怀疑患有抗体介导的神经系统疾病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/DFG-funds-new-clinical-research-unit-to-study-autoimmune-media-neurological-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230714/DFG-funds-new-clinical-research-unit-to-study-autoimmune-mediad-neurological-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c37e63b-6e51-4af3-9872-19e517458c99 Fri, 14 Jul 2023 20:13:29 -0400 DFG funds new clinical research unit to study autoimmune-mediated neurological diseases
